description: This file defines a DetailsFragment class for an Android TV frontend app. The fragment displays detailed information about a selected recipe, including an image, ingredients, and steps, leveraging Leanback library components and Glide for image loading.

classes.name: DetailsFragment
classes.description: A fragment that displays detailed information about a recipe, including image, ingredients, and preparation steps, using Android's Leanback library.

methods.name: onActivityCreated
methods.description: Initializes the fragment UI by retrieving the recipe data, setting up the presenter selector, configuring overlays for image and text, and populating the rows with recipe details, ingredients, and steps.
